entries.name: team-accelerator:deploy
entries.intent: Deploy applications to multi-cloud environments (Azure, AWS, GCP, Kubernetes) with support for Helm charts, GitHub Actions, and Harness pipelines

entries.name: team-accelerator:docs
entries.intent: Generate and manage documentation including OpenAPI specs, Mermaid diagrams, README files, changelogs, and ADRs

entries.name: team-accelerator:integrate
entries.intent: Generate and manage API integrations including REST clients, GraphQL schemas, database connections, and webhook handlers

entries.name: team-accelerator:perf
entries.intent: Performance monitoring and optimization with k6 load testing, Prometheus queries, Grafana dashboards, and profiling tools

entries.name: team-accelerator:quality
entries.intent: Run comprehensive code quality checks including linting, static analysis, security scanning, and dependency audits

entries.name: team-accelerator:status
entries.intent: Display team dashboard with deployment status, test results, quality metrics, and workflow health across all environments

entries.name: team-accelerator:test
entries.intent: Run test suites including unit tests, integration tests, E2E tests (Playwright/Selenium), and generate coverage reports

entries.name: team-accelerator:workflow
entries.intent: Manage CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions and Harness pipelines - create, validate, trigger, and monitor workflows
